lead_paragraph: A federal judge rejected a request for a new trial by two former associates of New Jersey Governor Chris Christie who were convicted for their roles in the "Bridgegate" lane closure scandal.
snippet: A federal judge rejected a request for a new trial by two former associates of New Jersey Governor Chris Christie who were convicted for their roles in the "Bridgegate" lane closure scandal....

headline.main: Ben Martin, Time Photographer Who Captured the 1960s, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Ben Martin, Time Photographer Who Captured the 1960s, Dies at 86
